mapper.select: SELECT num,d.userId,userName,subject,price,instantPrice,discountRate,category1,category2, people,approveCheck,start_date,end_date,content,saveFilename,originalFilename ,region1,region2,tag1,tag2,image1,image2,image3,image4,image5,image6,image7,image8,image9,image10 ,COUNT(dealNum) countLike FROM deal d LEFT JOIN dealLike l ON d.num=l.dealNum GROUP BY num ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT p.imageFilename,d.num,d.userId,userName,subject,price,instantPrice,discountRate,category1,category2, people,approveCheck,start_date,end_date,content,saveFilename,originalFilename ,region1,region2,tag1,tag2,image1,image2,image3,image4,image5,image6,image7,image8,image9,image10 ,COUNT(dealNum) countLike FROM deal d LEFT JOIN dealLike l ON d.num=l.dealNum LEFT JOIN photo p ON d.userId=p.userId GROUP BY num ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start}, 30

SELECT d.num,d.userId,userName,subject,price,instantPrice,discountRate,category1,category2, people,approveCheck,start_date,end_date,content,saveFilename,originalFilename ,region1,region2,tag1,tag2,image1,image2,image3,image4,image5,image6,image7,image8,image9,image10 ,COUNT(dealNum) countLike, p.imageFilename FROM deal d LEFT JOIN dealLike l ON d.num=l.dealNum LEFT JOIN photo p ON d.userId=p.userId WHERE d.num IN (select dealNum from dealjoin WHERE userId=#{userId}) GROUP BY num ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start}, 200
